CONTRACT_ID: 2BP3-159773 ITPro # 102545 - 60 Month Lease for a Colour Wide Format Multifunction Printer for DND
short_summary: Contract valuation of 180,000 for 60 month lease period
description: The Department of National Defence (DND), Real Property Operations Unit (Pacific) (RPOU(P)) Section Esquimalt, Geomatics has a requirement for a 60-month lease for a high end colour, wide format, multifunction printer. This Contract is for the supply, delivery, and installation of the equipment, as well as the necessary training, in French and English, to allow users to access all of the required features of the equipment.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Notice Title (English)**
--------------------------

60 Month Lease for a Colour Wide Format Multifunction Printer for DND

**Notice Title (French)**
-------------------------

Location de 60 mois pour une imprimante multifonction couleur grand format pour la MDN

**Notice Details**
-----------------

*   **Notice Reference:** SSC-24-00025764:T

*   **Tender Closing Date:** March 8, 2024 at 14:00:00

**Contract Details**
------------------

*   **Contract Type:** Lease for 60 months
*   **Request for:** Colour Wide Format Multifunction Printer
*   **Delivery Location:** British Columbia, Canada

**Bidder Details**
----------------

*   **Bidder Name:** Shared Services Canada

*   **Bidder Contact:** Luy, Channary, Phone: (613) 323-5347, Fax: (613) 123-4567

**Document Attachments**
----------------------

*   All documentation related to this notice, including the request for proposal, is available for download at the following link: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/922B77B2-A19B-40D7-BD12-7645E748D227](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/922B77B2-A19B-40D7-BD12-7645E748D227)

**Submission Guidelines**
----------------------

*   Bids will be accepted electronically.
*   All bids must be submitted through the Shared Services Canada electronic procurement system.
*   The electronic procurement system can be accessed online at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca) and following the link to the bid.
*   The bidder must register with the technical authority before submitting any information.
